newsitem.title: USA: J. Baker Inc Q4 Feb 1 loss after charge. [CORRECTED 12:05 GMT 22/3]
newsitem.headline: J. Baker Inc Q4 Feb 1 loss after charge. [CORRECTED 12:05 GMT 22/3]

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTES: 1997 losses in both periods include pretax restructuring charge of $122.3 million, equal to $117.1 million, or $8.42/shr, after taxes.
1996 year loss includes pretax restructuring charge of $69.3 million, equal to $41.6 million, or $3.00/shr, after taxes.
